news.title: Caoilian Sherlock joins Tessa Rose Jackson for The Sad Duet Tour
news.summary: The tour will hit various venues across Cork, Sherlock's native county, before a gig in Brighton, U.K.

news.title: Roddy Doyle unveils Booker Prize longlist
news.summary: It was described as the “most global Booker Prize longlist in a decade.”

news.title: Nick Cave uses AI for 'Tupelo' 40th anniversary music video
news.summary: Nick Cave previously called artificial intelligence "utterly disturbing"

news.title: Gurriers to feature on Music Venue Trust fundraising album with Wunderhorse, English Teacher, Opus Kink and more
news.summary: A Hideous Collection will released on September 5, available exclusively on vinyl and CD.

news.title: Levi Evans to release second EP Idling Outside
news.summary: Evans is a member of the music collective NOFUN!, who will play during the Electric Picnic Festival (August 29-31) and also The Workmans Club on August 29.

news.title: Netflix announce Pride and Prejudice cast featuring Daryl McCormack and Fiona Shaw
Finn Wolfhard announces EU/UK tour dates, including Dublin headliner this October
news.summary: The Stranger Things actor released his debut solo album Happy Birthday just last month.

news.title: Awdah Hathaleen, Palestinian activist who helped make Oscar-winning No Other Land, killed in West Bank
news.summary: Hathaleen, 32, was from the Masafer Yatta community, whose fight against Israeli violence was documented in the documentary No Other Land.

news.title: Bricknasty announce departure of band members Louis Younge and Dara Abdurahman
news.summary: Their final gig with bandmates Dara and Louis will be at All Together Now, this weekend

news.title: Former President Barack Obama invited to accept Freedom of Dublin duties
news.summary: Accepting Dublin's highest civic honour would grant the Obamas a number of ancient privileges and duties, such as the right to graze sheep on St. Stephen's Green.
